recipes.name: Monkey Bread
recipes.desc: A wonderful treat that is easy to make and easier to eat!
recipes.creator: Family Recipe
ingredients: 3 packages of tube biscuits, cut into 4ths
recipe: Place 1/4 Cups of brown sugar into a plastic bag.
Shake the biscuits in the bagand arrange them into a buttered tube pan.
In a heavy saucepan, combine the butter stick, the sugar, and 3/4 Cups of brown sugar.
Boil the mixture for 30 seconds, and pour the mixture over the biscuits.
Bake in the oven at 350Â°F for 45 minutes.

Pour the mixture into a waffle maker
